meanings.definition: A situation or experience that is mentally disorienting or confusing.
meanings.sent1: The movie's plot twists were real mindfucks.
meanings.sent2: I hate it when my mindfucks me with strange dreams.
meanings.sent3: Trying to solve a Rubik's cube can be a real mindfucks.
meanings.sent4: The maze of mirrors was a mindfucks for the participants.
meanings.sent5: The haunted house provided a mindfucks for all visitors.

meanings.definition: To mentally disorient or confuse someone.
meanings.sent1: The magician's tricks always mindfucks the audience.
meanings.sent2: Don't try to mindfucks me with your tricky questions.
meanings.sent3: The prankster loved to mindfucks his friends with harmless jokes.
meanings.sent4: The illusionist's performance mindfucks the viewers into disbelief.
meanings.sent5: The hypnotist can mindfucks people into thinking they are chickens.
